citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have a current attending veterinarian (AV). The licensee stated that their attending veterinarian
recently retired and he has not yet contacted another veterinarian. The licensee is still following the previous AV's
guidance and directions for pre-treating babies with vitamins and Revolution. Having a current attending veterinarian and
a current program of veterinary care is critical to maintaining the health and well-being of the animals.
***Correct by 1/12/24.

The licensee is lacking an updated animal inventory reflecting the currently housed 30 adult hedgehogs and 11 hamsters.
Inventory records allow Animal Care officials to track the animals. A current inventory with all required information must be
maintained for animals on hand, any offspring born on premises, and animals sold or dead.
***Correct by 1/12/24.

The licensee is lacking a written contingency plan. Dealers must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan to
provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an
emergency or disaster. Not having a written plan could cause delay of help for the animals and could negatively affect
their health and well-being in the case of an emergency or disaster.
***Correct by 1/12/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The licensee does not have a current attending veterinarian (AV). The licensee stated that their attending veterinarian 
recently retired and he has not yet contacted another veterinarian. The licensee is still following the previous AV's 
guidance and directions for pre-treating babies with vitamins and Revolution. Having a current attending veterinarian and 
a current program of veterinary care is critical to maintaining the health and well-being of the animals.  
 
***Correct by 1/12/24. 
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee is lacking an updated animal inventory reflecting the currently housed 30 adult hedgehogs and 11 hamsters. 
Inventory records allow Animal Care officials to track the animals. A current inventory with all required information must be 
maintained for animals on hand, any offspring born on premises, and animals sold or dead.  
 
***Correct by 1/12/24. 
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
The licensee is lacking a written contingency plan. Dealers must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan to 
provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an 
emergency or disaster. Not having a written plan could cause delay of help for the animals and could negatively affect 
their health and well-being in the case of an emergency or disaster.  
 
***Correct by 1/12/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

n
